org.afree.chart.renderer

Class LookupPaintScale

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.renderer.LookupPaintScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, PaintScale, PublicCloneable

    public class LookupPaintScale
extends java.lang.Object
implements PaintScale, PublicCloneable, java.io.Serializable
    A paint scale that uses a lookup table to associate paint instances with data value ranges.
    Since:
    JFreeChart 1.0.4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • add

        public void add(double value,
       PaintType paintType)
        Adds an entry to the lookup table. Any values from n up to but not including the next value in the table take on the specified paint.
        Parameters:
        value - the data value.
        paintType - the paint.
        Since:
        JFreeChart 1.0.6

      • getPaintType

        Returns:
        The paint type.
